name: 2022 Calendar, Autolayout Component with Variants
description:
Creating a calendar for any project takes time and you always need to change days for up to date look. This is why I created a calendar component that can be used for any of your project. It is all built with autolayout so by changing the main element you can fit it anywhere you want.


You can use this calendar for UI elements, planning tables, print designs. It includes all the months as variants, so it's easy to switch between months.
